title: We Have a Dream (with SuChin Pak & Kulap Vilaysack)
description:
DeRay, De'Ara, Sam, and Kaya dive into the underreported news of the week, including male friendships, D.C. statehood, locked Bitcoin, and the documentary "MLK/FBI". Netta Elzie gives updates on what's happening with the nationwide protests. DeRay sits down with SuChin Pak Kulap Vilaysack, of the Lemonada podcast "Add to Cart", to discuss the political and emotional effects of being a consumer. For a transcript of this episode, please visit crooked.com/podsavethepeople.

 

Links:

DeRay

Kaya

Sam

De'Ara
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
